title: Digital Marketing Executive - WFH
job_overview:
We are seeking a dynamic Marketing Executive/Virtual Assistant to join our team. This role encompasses a diverse range of responsibilities in the marketing domain, including but not limited to:

Key Responsibilities:

Oversee corporate marketing platforms, including website management, eNewsletter distribution, Social Media presence, and coordinating Exhibition/Roadshows.
Design, develop, and maintain marketing collaterals such as datasheets, brochures, posters, and exhibition designs to ensure brand consistency and message alignment.
Execute tasks using CRM, ERP, and cloud workflow systems to streamline marketing operations.
Take charge of the new eCommerce website, manage product mix, oversee order fulfilment, and optimize logistics for efficient operations.

Qualifications and Skills:

Proven experience in marketing-related roles, preferably with exposure to multiple facets of marketing platforms and tools.
Proficiency in Microsoft PowerPoint, Publisher, and/or Adobe Illustrator is preferred.
Strong copywriting skills and an understanding of design principles are essential.
Knowledge of SEO/SEM strategies is a significant advantage.
Willingness to embrace and adapt to new skills and technologies, demonstrating a proactive attitude toward learning.
Exceptional organizational and time-management abilities.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.


Application Instructions:
Please attach a link to your resume and portfolio in the cover letter. Applications without a portfolio link may not be considered.
